I have also seen this in the 20030921 nightly build.
I'm not able to reproduce the problem, can you provide a test case ?

It occured to me three times, two of which I remember to be in
AbstractTextEditor.elementStateValidationChanged(Object, boolean), or rather in
the Runnable created there (class is AbstractTextEditor$1 in my case).

Just rechecked on 200309170800 and cannot reproduce there, however a different
defect shows: when I am on line 237 (enableSanityChecking(true)) and press
Ctrl+Shift+B to toggle a breakpoint, BPs only get added, but never removed. To
remove, I have to click the BP marker in the ruler or use the breakpoint view.

Just reckecked on 200309160800 and cannot reproduce, also the defect mentioned
above does not occur.

When retrying with 200309170800 everything is fine, neither of both bugs show...
strange.

Will try to debug if it occurs again.
*** Bug 43869 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Fixed.
It was a side effect of the fix for bug 41647.
Changes in ReferenceTypeImpl#locationOfLine(String, String, int)

Forgot to add that the problem was the types without method (like the interface
in the test case) were no managed.
